result.title: MATILDE Summer school
result.description: D7.7 MATILDE Summer school will be a face-to-face training course focusing on methodologies and tools to investigate the impact of international migration in rural and mountain areas. It will be organized by Eurac in Subtask 7.4.2 and it will be open to c.25 young researchers and practitioners from EU and non-EU countries.
